ready() - Method in class com.spazedog.lib.rootfw4.utils.io.FileReader
reboot() - Method in class com.spazedog.lib.rootfw4.utils.Device
Reboots the device.

This method first tries using the reboot command from toolbox.
rebootRecovery(Context) - Method in class com.spazedog.lib.rootfw4.utils.Device
Reboots the device into the recovery.

This method first tries using the PowerManager, if that fails it fallbacks on using the reboot command from toolbox.

Note that using the PowerManager requires your app to optain the 'REBOOT' permission.
rebootSoft() - Method in class com.spazedog.lib.rootfw4.utils.Device
Invokes a soft reboot on the device (Restart all services) by using a sysrq trigger.
remove() - Method in class com.spazedog.lib.rootfw4.utils.File

runInRecovery(Context, String...) - Method in class com.spazedog.lib.rootfw4.utils.File
Reboot into recovery and run this file/package
This method will add a command file in /cache/recovery which will tell the recovery the location of this package.
